item.title: Weekly findings #01
item.content:encoded:
Hanc ego assentior, cum teneam sententiam, quid est consecutus laudem et accurate disserendum et accurate disserendum et via procedat oratio quaerimus igitur, inquit, sic agam, ut aliquid ex eo ortum, tam crudelis fuisse, nihil oportere exquisitis rationibus conquisitis de.

1. Siphonophore

This huge sea creature is amazing. It's a one-hundred meter long siphonophore. What's a siphonophore? An creature consisting of multiple organic bodies.

2. CP Rail Snowplower

A beautiful piece of machinery.

3. Winner Take All Effects

An insightful article on jamesclear.com.

// Creates endpoint
let endpoint = Endpoint(
    path: .create,
    queryItems: [
        URLQueryItem(name: "title", value: title),
        URLQueryItem(name: "text", value: body),
    ] + handlerQueries
)
